sn51.30:4.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu … pe …
sn51.30:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn51.30:4.3: “katamā nu kho, bhikkhave, iddhi, katamo iddhipādo, katamā iddhipādabhāvanā, katamā iddhipādabhāvanāgāminī paṭipadā”ti?
sn51.30:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.30:6.2: Yo, bhikkhave, maggo, yā paṭipadā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati—
sn51.30:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi … pe …
